title: Purpose of Filters
text: Filters are used to display only the data that meets specific conditions.

title: Temporary View
text: Using a filter allows a temporary view of the data without altering the original dataset.

title: Criteria-Based Selection
text: Filters help in selecting data based on certain criteria, such as dates or numerical values.

title: Non-Destructive Action
text: Applying a filter does not delete or modify the data permanently.

hintAnswer: To view only specific data that meets certain criteria
title: Correct Use of Filters
choices: To view only specific data that meets certain criteria
To change the format of the entire spreadsheet
To create a backup of the spreadsheet
